section.title: item groups creating new Item Group
section.para: To create a new Item Group, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: Create your Item Groups using a logical, hierarchical structure. This will make it easier to retrieve Item Group information in the future.

section.para: When creating a new Item Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique name for the Item Group.
Enter a description to further identify the Item Group.
Display lists member Items of the Item Group.
